articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad 
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Functions were held in France, at Chambogo University of Uganda and the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm on Dec. 11 and 12 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of office as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and the 88th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
 The representative president of the France-Korea Friendship Association in his speech at a rally and an "evening of culture" held in France said that the powerful Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il has ensured peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and guaranteed the future of Korea's reunification. He sincerely wished Kim Jong Il good health for the prosperity and independent reunification of Korea.    
 The chief of the Juche Idea Study Group of Teachers of the Psychological Faculty of Chambogo University of Uganda in a lecture titled "Three Generals of Mt. Paektu in Korea" said in detail that President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea, defeated the U.S. imperialists and defended the sovereignty of the country, that Kim Jong Suk set an example of devotedly defending the leader and gave birth to Kim Jong Il and brought him up as the bright future of Korea during the anti-Japanese struggle and that Kim Jong Il has smashed the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun policy.
 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm in his speech at a rally said it is the honor of not only the Korean people but the Iranian people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as KPA supreme commander. He affirmed that the Iranian people would always stand on the side of the Korean people and resolutely support their just cause.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Society Formed in India
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Society Formed in India 
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Himachal Pradesh, India, Society for the Study of the Juche Idea was inaugurated with due ceremony in Shimla, India, on Dec. 12.
 At the ceremony, Prof. and Dr. S. K. Garg of Himachal Pradesh University was elected chairman of the society and Dr. S. P. Bansal, chairman of the Vocational Training Institute of the university, secretary general of the society.    
 The chairman of the society said that it is the greatest honor for them to form the society for the study of the Juche idea praised and followed by the world and that he would deepen the study of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and positively disseminate it in the northern area.
  The secretary general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il and others made congratulatory speeches at the ceremony.

articles.title: 17th Candle-light Rally to Denounce Murder of Farmer Jon Yong Chol Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
17th Candle-light Rally to Denounce Murder of Farmer Jon Yong Chol Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The 17th candle-light rally was reportedly held in Pusan of south Korea on Dec. 14 to demand the nullification of the "National Assembly's" ratification of the bill on rice negotiations and denounce the murder of farmer Jon Yong Chol, probe the truth behind it and punish those responsible for it.
 The participants said that the police authorities try to wind up the murder case only by disestablishing the police chief who commanded the then suppression.    
 They strongly held that if the "government" recognizes that the death of Jon Yong Chol is the murder by the police violence, it should formally apologize for it and dismiss, detain and punish the chief of the Seoul Police Office and all others responsible for the murder and the violence.
 Meanwhile, students affiliated to the Pusan and South Kyongsang Provincial Federation of University Student Councils under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils conducted information activities heralding the nullification of the "bill on rice negotiations" in a metro of the city.

Greetings to President of Niger
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Niger
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mamadou Tandja, president and head of state of Niger, on December 14 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic of Niger.
 The message sincerely wished him greater success in his work for prosperity and peace of the country.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun Meets Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun Meets Palestinian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who paid a farewell call on him Monday.
